title: Coconut lemon meringue cupcakes
ingredients: ['Coconut Cupcakes', '250g butter', '400g caster sugar', '250ml coconut milk', '2 tsp vanilla extract', '325g plain flour', '1 tbsp baking powder', '1/2 tsp salt', '6 egg whites', 'Lemon Curd', '125ml lemon juice', '150g caster sugar', '3 egg yolks', '100g butter, cubed', '2 tsp lemon zest', 'Meringue', '3 egg whites (125ml)', '200g caster sugar', 'desiccated coconut, lightly toasted']
